name: Combat Neon
description:
Combat Neon is a fast-paced, competitive, twin stick shooter for 1-4 players. (gamepad required)

Made for #LOWRESJAM, the game and all effects are rendered to a 64x64 resolution and then upscaled.

Follow me on twitter: @_JerD


Controls:
  • left stick: move, right stick: aim
  • left trigger: dash
  • right trigger: shoot
